A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow. What a piece of... People\, if we keep giving our money to disney for garbage\, they are only going to keep making garbage for you. This is how we have arrived at this point.  I implore you all to stop supporting this trend. Its obvious there was no consideration in the dialogue\, characters\, character development\, history\, and especially the story. They didnt care if this movie was good or not\, they cared about your money and thier narrative. I am done with Star Wars. What a sad way to end the franchise.
